Breaking Changes¶

In 0.9.3¶

Core module

  • client have been moved to core.
  • Dataabase.add_attachement have been renamed to Database.put_attachment
  • Database.get_attachment have been renamed to Database.fetch_attachmet

Schema module

  • ViewProperty have been removed in favor of schema.design_doc
  • No more load(db). Use schema.db_session instead.
